title: 결과 강조 - 예상외 결과
description: 예상하지 못한 놀라운 결과를 강조하는 원어민 수준의 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: I really didn't expect this result. It's completely unexpected.
Who would have known it would turn out like this? So surprising.
It went in a completely different direction. Fascinating.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 예상외 결과 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 이런 결과는 정말 예상 못 했어. 완전 뜻밖이야.
sentences.en: I really didn't expect this result. It's completely unexpected.

sentences.kr: 누가 이럴 줄 알았겠어? 정말 놀라워.
sentences.en: Who would have known it would turn out like this? So surprising.
It went in a completely different direction. Fascinating.

sentences.kr: 예측 불가능한 결과야. 이래서 인생이 재밌는 거지.
sentences.en: It's an unpredictable outcome. This is what makes life interesting.

sentences.kr: 상상도 못 한 전개야. 소설보다 기가 막혀.
sentences.en: It's a development I couldn't even imagine. More dramatic than fiction.

sentences.kr: 이런 반전이 있을 줄이야. 정말 깜짝 놀랐어.
sentences.en: Who knew there'd be such a twist? I'm really shocked.

sentences.kr: 계획과 정반대로 됐네. 하지만 더 좋아.
sentences.en: It turned out opposite to the plan. But it's even better.

sentences.kr: 완전 예상 밖의 수확이야. 보너스를 받은 기분.
sentences.en: It's a completely unexpected gain. Feels like getting a bonus.
